report.title: UKBMS Branch Walks: Top level samples list for a Branch Manager
report.description: A list of top level samples for use in the UKBMS Branch Walks report calendar grid. Filtered according to the ID of the manager when logged into the CMS, and optional location ID List. Top level means that the parent_id field of the samples is null.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=s.sample_method_id LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id #joins# WHERE s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id IS NULL AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (CAST(s.sample_method_id AS character varying)='#sample_method_id#' OR '#sample_method_id#'='' OR ctt.term='#sample_method_id#') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (CAST(l.id AS character varying)='#location_id#' OR '#location_id#' = '') #filters# #order_by#
report.field_sql: s.id as sample_id, su.title as survey, COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) as location_name, l.id as location_id, l.code, s.entered_sref, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: sample_method_id
param.description: Select the sample method, or leave blank to not filter by sample method.
